website_summaries.verdict: The comfort and utility of the New Balance 1865 pleased numerous consumers. Despite a few complaints about cushioning, it still came highly recommended as an everyday walking shoe.
pros: A majority of shoppers stated that the New Balance 1865 felt comfortable during extended periods of walking and standing
Many consumers claimed that the trainer fit them well
Its lightweight nature was praised immensely by numerous owners
A good number of reviewers appreciated that it presented adequate lateral and arch support
Several wearers reported that the footgear relieved their foot, leg and back pains
cons: The cushioning unit was believed to be too thin and did not supply a comfortable footbed, according to some purchasers

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size larger than usual
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a fine shoe, but sized smaller than usual (I guess, unless New Balance has changed the sizing pattern for the whole lineup). I have 2 (different) pairs of New Balance shoes at 10.5, one for casual and one for workouts, and they fit perfectly. The current shoe is a 1/2 size too small, crimping my toes.
customer_reviews.author: osguthjd

customer_reviews.title: Not NB's best walking shoes at the moment.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these shoes(I was able to order them for sub $40 on sale), unfortunately they arrived and we're a half size smaller than I was used to with New Balance. My previous pair walking shoes(85v1) we're 8.5m mens and fit perfectly. I ordered these 1865v1, as well as some 1165 Fresh Foams(both in 8.5m) and the 1865 we're to small. The 1165 Fresh Foam fit as expected compared to my 85v1. I preferred the materials and designs of the 1165 more so as well.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanSpy519

customer_reviews.title: Big Foot? Forget these!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not up to expected NB standards. Have worn for years due to my ‘big wide feet’ but these are so far from fitting correctly I may have to dump NB. I currently have two pair of older NB (2 yr & 4yr older). Both are 13 2E. The ‘new’ were purchased as 13 4E and are not as wide and almost a full 1” shorter than either of the older styles. The suggestion to “buy a size larger” will only work if the shoe last is truely just universally under sized. It won’t help if the ball is not properly located relative to the heel. I don’t see an option for 6E!
customer_reviews.author: Caver69

customer_reviews.title: Did a lot of walking in these this week, and I'm not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm more on the cushioning side. My two Mizuno shoes have me feeling a lot better after heavy use than these. Not a lot of impact absorption with the heels.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support for walking. I have not found a better shoe for the amount of walking that I do. I wear these while I walk, five to six miles, in the morning. This is my fifth and sixth pair. I buy two pair and alternate between them every da. They last longer if you use two pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A true Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I ordered double wide which is 4E. They have the perfect amount of room in the “shoe box”. The shoe angles your weight slightly to the heel and somehow when to walk the shoe helps create forward momentum. Yes your speed just simply increases. Great modern looking shoe also. Perfect shoe for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roady3

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY. Shoe does not follow standard sizing.
customer_reviews.text: New Balance have been a very reliable shoe for people with wide feet and having a lot of really good features based on your intended use. These shoes failed. They are shorter than standard US sizing and a 2E width is actually narrow, not wide. For the price I paid ($102), I am very disappointed and wish I could have returned them. I do not recommend purchasing this shoe and if New Balance is going to be inconsistent and not follow standard sizing, then I will no longer purchase this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. Go one size bigger. Purchase is a waste cause I cannot return it. Cost of returning would be more than the cost of shoes. I live in Grenada. Bought this when I was in Miami.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I actually had to go to Walmart and ...
customer_reviews.text: No cushioning in the mid sole (metatarsal) what so ever which surprised me as this was an upgrade to the NB walking shoes I have worn for years. Very disappointed. I actually had to go to Walmart and get an additional pad just to use them for casual wear let alone walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit great. this pair a lot smaller
customer_reviews.text: ordered the same size before. fit great. this pair a lot smaller. Thought was free return was charged $4.56 to return exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as hoped
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4E. Still a bit tight. Hoping they will break in. Shoe looks to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: BigE

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: I am saddened that New Balance is "imported" as I like to buy American whenever possible. The shoes are OK, as expected but could use more cushioning in the foot bed.
customer_reviews.author: RE Pristoop

customer_reviews.title: This model needs an extra half size to fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 in all my other new balance shoes, in this model I needed a 10 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: W G White

customer_reviews.title: A little tighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: The toe box seems a little tight as does the width. I ordered the 2E width. Would recommend ordering a half size larger and maybe wider.
customer_reviews.author: tauneutrino

customer_reviews.title: n/a
customer_reviews.text: Expected toe area to be a little wider for X wide sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bodach

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small but still comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This model is a bit narrower than other NB's shoes but it is quite comfortable overall. Better get half a size bigger just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Licson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. A little long on the delivery however
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Constructed well. Very satisfied. A little long on the delivery however, it was made clear of delivery times to me. Overall, very happy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D Carney

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were to small I have ordered New Balance shoes same size for years. These don't fit they are shorter. Hurts my toes. You don't realize until you wear them. I'll never order on line again. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: new balance men's tenni shoes
customer_reviews.text: I always buy new balance for my husband. They are a little more expensive, but worth it as far as quality and length of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Teri V.

customer_reviews.title: Yes like a few others have said on these
customer_reviews.text: Yes like a few others have said on these, probably a have size or wide bigger, than they would be a 5. Really comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph m

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Replaced well-worn ASICS Gel Walkers. Very Pleased. Comfortable, supportive, good torsional control.
customer_reviews.author: see2xu

customer_reviews.title: It's a great shoe for walking
customer_reviews.text: It's a great shoe for walking, just watch out for size. All my other shoes are men's 11, including another pair of New Balance. I had to send these back and order an 11.5 as the 11s were a bit too snug.
customer_reviews.author: mustang1

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pair of NB that feel good. I own a lot of shoes and these ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pair of NB that feel good. I own a lot of shoes and these are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These walking shoes are very comfortable and a high tech shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Pooofjolly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and wide shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband he loves this shoes he has wide feet, and New balance shoes are the only wide ones..
customer_reviews.author: Yuri G

customer_reviews.title: My favorite walking shoe due to my flat feet
customer_reviews.text: On to my second pair of these. My favorite walking shoe due to my flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: good enough
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a good pair of inserts to make these things comfortable. The inserts that came with this shoe were paper thin and useless.
customer_reviews.author: CI

customer_reviews.title: Tends to run small--I ordered a half-size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Great support in a surprisingly light package. Comfortable and excellent adjustment with lace system.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these walking shoes, well supported in all the right places for walking
customer_reviews.author: Larry F. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Last is half size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I've worn New Balance for years. They're a great shoe (and, made in the USA) but this is the first time I've tried this model (up a few notchs from the 990 that I've worn) but the last appears to be different because I ordered the same size I've worn in my tennis shoes, running shoes, walking shoes, etc and these run a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: SlippySlope

customer_reviews.title: This is a great walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fitting walking shoe and it's a shame that New Balance is discontinuing this model without an adequate replacement. Grateful that Amazon could still get me a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned it said it was 4E was not near that wide
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes, this is a very good brand, wear them for long time
customer_reviews.author: Jorge E. Sikaffy

customer_reviews.title: Xxxx
customer_reviews.text: I like the style. That shoes came little tight, I guess they will widen with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Funderburg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice although original purchase too small. Had to return and increase size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laces were too short for full lace up
customer_reviews.text: the shoe laces were too short and of inferior quality. Pls advise if longer more appropriate laces are available. thank you. tom brennan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes look nice. I read the reviews ahead of time and ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look nice. I read the reviews ahead of time and ordered a size that was a half size larger than what I wear. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I walk 30-35 miles a week. Very comfortable. You can expect about 550-600 miles from this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Whitey

customer_reviews.title: Length was accurate and otherwise a nice shoe. Just didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Not the typical New Balance 4E width. Too narrow. Length was accurate and otherwise a nice shoe. Just didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Barry H

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable shoe I have every worn.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, feel light compared to some of my other pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking I believe it will loosen it's tightness after a couple to wearing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice style. Comfort was okay but not quite as ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice style. Comfort was okay but not quite as much cushion as I was hoping for. I normally wear a size 14 4E in New Balance but these were too tight in length.
customer_reviews.author: W Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent experience
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! It fits perfectly and looks even better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ramos

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Men's 1865v1 size 11 EEEE were marked incorrectly (actual shoe size was much smaller than size marked)
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were marked 11 EEEE, but were much smaller than the three previous New Balance shoes I purchased through Amazon. I believe the shoe size was marked incorrectly. I returned the shoes and I plan to reorder when I return to Oklahoma City.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Fit too small
customer_reviews.text: Have bought several pairs of New Balance in the same exact size as these, but these were way too tight in the front and even a bit short. Also selected fantom fit as a fit I like but these did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Duck Fan

customer_reviews.title: I love them they are comfortable and light to wear
customer_reviews.text: I love them they are comfortable and light to wear:-))
customer_reviews.author: Imatino

customer_reviews.title: Don’t look 4E wide but ARE
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival they didn’t look wide at all but they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfortable shoe. Combination of the design, material, and the extra wide option make for an all around great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Will be exchanging for larger size,
customer_reviews.text: Will be exchanging for larger size , shoe has a tight cut I will be ordering a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: 704ever

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for size 2E
customer_reviews.text: Fit better than I expected, it's so hard to find size 2E shiest.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had better and more comfortable shoes from new balance
customer_reviews.text: I had better and more comfortable shoes from new balance. They look good, but lack comfy cushioning. I guess it's "neutral". I expected them to be better than a $80 new balance. The sizing does run smaller, order a 1/2 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Baker

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the overall shoe and feel though a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the overall shoe and feel though a little small compared to other NB models. Will know more after extensive use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I returned them and ordered a 10 4E which fits perfect. I really like these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of NB sneakers. I normally get a 9.5 2E which was my first try with this style. It was very tight. I returned them and ordered a 10 4E which fits perfect. I really like these sneakers. If you've ever walked on an anti-fatigue mat then that's how it's like walking in these...very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GHoover

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews and ordered 1/2 size bigger than I usually go and they fit perfect. I use them for the treadmill and they're comfortable, well cushioned and lightweight. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stevebowl

customer_reviews.title: Need me some in 4E width!
customer_reviews.text: Great cushioning! However, they aren't as wide as some of the shoes I've bought before. If your buying these cause they are wide don't expect these to be the perfect, like-a-glove fit. I really like them, but I will stay away from the 2E width. Need these in a 4E!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good to know
customer_reviews.text: Neve again Second worst pair from New Balance bo support
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Not good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a nice walking shoe , I only walk in them one time : they are the rights size but are not wide enough I need a E . In width .but since I had a bad experience with this shoe from amazon/ I decided to Not sent them back They are not great in return items: I went Thur hell John
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes Returned - Too Tight!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to return these! Even though I ordered exactly the same size as my current New Balance shoes (9D) these simply felt too tight. I suspect it is because the material across the top is not mesh like my existing shoes (the length was fine; it was the width that felt too ttght) Instead of these, I ordered New Balance Men's M860SB4, Silver/Blu, in the same size (9D). This pair cost over $15 less than the pair I returned plus the fit is "As expected (96%)" compared to the pair I returned that only 53% of customers said the fit was "As expected". Most people of the comments I read were complaining that the shoes felt too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Size Issues?
customer_reviews.text: Seems comfortable, but size did not seem right. I ordered the same size as my previous New Balance sneakers but these were too small. Returning them and reordering the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie G.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were just a bit too small for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Worn new balance forever. Never had a problem with size until this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Norman D Fountain
